ComicInfo.Summary: Reverend Song Sung Bloo is a cult leader with a large following. He communes with space-children, and passes their wisdom on to his disciples for a nominal contribution. The three sisters have infiltrated the cult, and are causing events to take place that are being interpreted as divine. When Spawn tells Bloo what is happening, Bloo decides itâ€™s time for him and his followers to leave this mortal plane, and join the space children of Antares.
ComicInfo.Title: Song Sung Bloo
